amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 110-407 to prohibit the use of any funds for first-class or business-class airline travel by agency employees when carrying out the provisions of H.R. 3867. The amendment includes exceptions provided by the Code of Federal Regulations 301-10.122 to 10.124, as applicable to federal agency employees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lampson amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
